<Extension()> Public Function List (operations As IServiceTagsOperations, location As String) As ServiceTagsListResult

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.

The location that will be used as a reference for version (not as a filter based on location, you will get the list of service tags with prefix details across all regions but limited to the cloud that your subscription belongs to).
Docs.summary: Gets a list of service tag information resources.
